definitions.definition: A road or track not following a main route; a secondary or minor road or path .
A road that is not frequently travelled .
a little-known or arcane field of study or detail .

main_definition: A road or track not following a main route; a secondary or minor road or path .
secondary_definitions: A road that is not frequently travelled .
( by extension ) a little-known or arcane field of study or detail .
